snippet: An Egyptian militant group that has pledged allegiance to the Islamic State extremist organization claimed responsibility on Sunday for the killing of an American petroleum expert, according to the SITE Intelligence Group.
abstract: Ansar Beit al-Maqdis, Egyptian militant group aligned with Islamic State, claims responsibility for killing American oil worker William Henderson.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian militant group that has pledged allegiance to the Islamic State extremist organization claimed responsibility on Sunday for the killing of an American petroleum expert, according to the SITE Intelligence Group.

headline.main: Egypt: Islamic State Allies Say They Killed an American Worker
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Islamic State Allies Say They Killed an American Worker

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
